contents.text: Thank you for calling Nuro South Bay, where we deploy self-driving vehicles to accelerate the benefits of robotics.
To schedule a local goods delivery with our autonomous vehicles, press 1.
To request a new delivery service, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our delivery scheduling team.

navigationGoals: Book a one-time package pickup and delivery from my office to a client's address tomorrow morning.
I need to schedule a delivery of my groceries using your autonomous service.
I need to schedule an autonomous last-mile delivery for a 5 kg hardware shipment between two South Bay addresses.
I’d like to schedule a grocery delivery from my nearby store.
I’d like to schedule a same-day pickup and delivery of lab equipment across campus.

contents.text: For pricing details and service area information, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our pricing specialist.

navigationGoals: Get a quote for delivery costs and confirm service availability for a 15-mile route across the Bay Area.
I’d like to know your delivery rates and whether you cover my neighborhood.
I’d like to get a detailed price quote and service area map for Nuro’s autonomous goods delivery.
I need to check if you serve my area and what the delivery fee would be.
I need a quote on delivery fees and to confirm if my off-campus apartment is within your service area.

contents.text: For help with an existing delivery, press 2.
To track your current delivery, press 1.
One moment please, connecting you to delivery tracking.

navigationGoals: Check the real-time status of my delivery scheduled for today.
I want to track the status of my current delivery.
Please provide real-time telemetry and ETA updates for my currently en route autonomous delivery.
I want to track where my current delivery is right now.
I want to track the real-time status of my current delivery of biology samples.

contents.text: For technical support or other questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Resolve an error in the app that's preventing me from viewing my delivery details.
I need help updating the drop-off instructions for my delivery.
I need to troubleshoot a sensor error (code 0x3F2) on my active autonomous delivery vehicle.
I’m having trouble with the delivery tracking feature and need technical assistance.
I’m seeing an error code in the app for my scheduled delivery and need technical assistance.
